name: Code Brown (itch)
description:
Code Brown is a game where your control over the character will degrade over time! You've got to reach the goal before the timer runs out. The longer you take, the harder it becomes!

As with most 3D games, the windows version runs smoother  than the HTML / browser version. Download of the windows version available below.

This is my first game jam and my first 3D game! Let me know in the comments what you think! Remember, this is made for the theme "out of control"!
